name: Fudge The Dice
description:
Welcome, player, and prepare for your weekly game of Dice & Daggers.

Stuck with a sadistic Dungeon master, you'll likely need to cheat a bit to have a shot against the waves of foes he's sending your way. Be careful though, as every dungeon master, he will not take you fudging the dice so kindly... Maybe prepare a spare bag of crisps, just in case...

This game was made in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2022. The theme was "ROLL OF THE DICE".

Credits

Artist : Sommervogel Benoit

Developer : Sommervogel Louis and Sommervogel Matthieu

Soundtracks by  Thibault Pierre

All sound FX from freesound.org (CC0 license).

Font : Virus Killer by Khurasan
